name: OOAK Lace Wedding Guest Book, DIY, Scrapbook, Personalized, Handmade, Your Choice Color
description: This beautiful handmade guipure lace a three dimensional design is an original work, pre-1930s, ivory lace. Although this particular piece is no longer available. See the 1st picture what other beauties I have in my collection. This is a DIY project, you choose the lace you'd like, and color of the silk and size of the book whether you want to make a guest book with lines or photo guest book with a thicker spin for photos, this can be exactly what you want. I'll do the rest... You can have printed lines, in all or just a part of your book. Book lays flat. 9.25 x 7.5 can be 9x12 with other laces. See my blog for more information on these OOAK Books. Books are generally 100 pgs ( 100 sides) of 190 gsm silk covers, antique or vintage lace and my own personal crocheted pearls and pearl buttons. Unlined wedding guest books lend themselves to becoming story/memory books where guests can write their thoughts of the day, pictures can be added to the tale and the story evolves. See personalization for twists. Follow me through: http://artbychapin.wordpress.com http://artbychapin.com or http://facebook.com/artbychapin http://twitter.com/artbychapin Best Debbie A little history: Guipure (Ge-Pure'). A French word signifying vellum lace. "Vellum" means " parchment," and parchment is sheep-skin, tanned and bleached white fit for writing or printing on. " Cartisane " is another French word signifying a long thin strip of parchment or vellum rolled round and completely covered with twisted silk. To produce Guipure lace, the old French lace-makers first formed the outlines of the intended pattern of these car-tisanes, they being held together at various points by stitches called "brides " or "bars," worked with the needle. These minute cords or car-tisanes were either arranged so as to touch one another, and be sewed together often enough for solidity, or were attached in the form of a figure by the "brides."

name: Photo Album Pen, Wedding Guest Book Pen, Custom Made Pen, Archival, Indian Ink
description: Pen Brush with Lace cover My newest offering is a Brush Pen with lace cover. You can order one with any book to match your lace and silk (if lace is not available we'll use a comparable lace) This big brush pen is filled with pigmented drawing ink that is extremely light fast and waterproof and works exactly like a regular pen or marker. Use the end point to write fine lines and sign your signature. These long lasting pens are convenient to use and all are pH neutral and acid-free. A unique brush point ensures an even flow of ink, gliding gently and smoothly over the paper while retaining its shape even after constant use. This is an introductory offer so this price is subject to change. Pin It

description:
A Beach Wedding Guest Book made for your Tropical Destination Wedding inspired by Caribbean on shimmering shantung wrapped in net, knots on hand painted silk. This handmade beach wedding guest book hand painted shantung in sea foam blue green is covered in nautical knots and Celtic spirals over a coral colored scallop shell. Optional Starfish center. 

Custom Silk colors can be customized to your combination of colors and shells. Also Available in solid colors like navy See: http://www.artbychapin.com/product/bohemian-beach-wedding-starfish-guest-book-destination-wedding-shell  

This Luxury Wedding book is hand bound, handsewn, and handmade lay-flat reinforced linen binding. This book comes with a handmade spiral cord to keep pages from flipping in the breeze. Makes a unique memory guest book. 100 pages (100 sides ) of heavy weight 190 gsm ivory/cream Archival Papers. 9 x 12 Landscape book.

Made to Order Book. 
If you would like one like these customized to your colors convo me 

Rush custom jobs* with materials in house are available for an additional $100. *any job under the standard time of 10 working days.

FOR US SHIPPING 
Sent by USPS Priority Mail Domestic, Rush Shipment available via Fed Ex or USPS Express Mail.

FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING 
All International orders are shipped USPS Express International at a flat cost. International customs charges are responsibility of the buyer. Delays in customs are not the responsibility of the vendor. If you know that it takes 6 weeks to get through customs in your country please allow for this when ordering

I post weekly to:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/artbychapin
Blog: http://artbychapin.wordpress.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/artbychapin

Best
Debbie

name: Luxury Custom Photo Album, 9x11 Rose Design Alencon Lace Champagne Silk, Photo Book
description:
Luxury, Lace wedding album, wedding photo albums, wedding scrapbook albums, wedding photo guest book, large photo album, wedding album books, scrapbook albums, just a few ways to use this book.  This book is handbound, handsewn, and handmade and lay-flat reinforced linen binding. Makes a great unique photo book or memory/guest book.  100 pages (100 sides) of heavy weight 190 gsm ivory/cream Archival Papers (other colors available). 9 x 12 Landscape book. This Book comes with Alencon lace with or without russian netting and my own crocheted pearls covered button and double string of crocheted pearls. Made to Order Book. name: Custom Wedding Photo Album, Point de Gaze OOAK,  Handmade Personalized
description:
This is a work of art in lace and is priced as such. It is a OOAK original point de gaze in mint condition displaying wheat shafts and leaves. I've sewn it to a large 15x15 board covered with a shimmering copper charmeuse silk in a custom color mix that I've hand dyed and a new color that I'm adding to my shops because it is soooo beautiful.... it shimmers and changes color with the light. 

I created this for the Etsy Wedding Team (EWT) Fall Challenge, a contest we've set up between the vendors to inspire a special creation. This is for sale but it is priced as a work of art. 

Point de gaze is made with super fine thread, finer than sewing thread. It takes 60 hours to make one rose so I estimate that this represents 3-6 months of work. If you were able to find a skilled worker who could recreate this for you it would cost for the time of the maker anywhere from $9600-$19,000 in time. 

It is possible to buy this book all the policies of the shop apply. This book is 100 pages ( 100 sides) with archival 190 gsm paper and spacers for a photo album or scrapbook use. Shipping would be by Fed Ex only and special charges do apply for artship box insured. Custom charges would be the responsibility of the client.
Rush custom jobs* with materials in house are available for an additional $100. *any job under the standard time of 15 working days.

Important Information: 
Ready to Ship to you in 15 working days 
Will be sent USPS Priority Mail Domestic

*FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING 
We use USPS Express Int'l shipping. 
Overseas Clients: If you add options to your case added shipping charges are automatically added because of the way the site is set up. We will refund the difference of actual shipping charges from the amount charged. Thanks for understanding. International customs charges are responsibility of the buyer.

If you have any questions about shipping, please don't hesitate to convo me for more info. 
Thanks!
